title: LUCK Be A LADY
body_text:
Over the last half-decade,
EastCoastDodgeball
has seen a lot of 'em come and a lot of 'em go. But through it all, an exclusive number of warriors have both celebrated in triumph and withstood the agony of defeat. Now, in 2011, those select names forever etched in stone face the onslaught of a new breed ready to conquer the dodgeball world. Welcome to "Rookie vs. Legend".
New sensation
Joanice Lima
has shown mental prowess and physical resiliency in her brief, yet impressive rise to superstardom. Her specialty sideline throw is expected to be fully locked and powerfully loaded if she intends to defeat her opposing combatant.
Born May 8, 1985
Debut July 24, 2010 | FAMILY AFFAIR III
With over five-plus years of experience,
Lauren Stopa
has nearly done it all. Intense battles with Lauren Winston and several career-threatening injuries have not forced this legend into early retirement. Her extensive knowledge of the game and its competitors give her the edge heading into MAYDAY.
Born June 15, 1987
Debut November 5, 2005 | DODGEBALL XTWO
Brace yourself for the crash landing that is
EastCoastDodgeball
MAYDAY
!
It all goes "down"
Saturday, May 21
, beginning at
5pm
, from the hallowed grounds of
Wall High School
.
________________________________________
____________________________
MAYDAY Exclusive!
On June 18,
ECD
proudly presents the unprecedented 4th Annual
FAMILY AFFAIR
extravaganza. In preparation for the monumental event, "The Writer" will announce the titanic-sized main event for the June 18th spectacular. Keep your voices down and your ears open for the earth-shattering news!
body_html:
Over the last half-decade, EastCoastDodgeball has seen a lot of 'em come and a lot of 'em go. But through it all, an exclusive number of warriors have both celebrated in triumph and withstood the agony of defeat. Now, in 2011, those select names forever etched in stone face the onslaught of a new breed ready to conquer the dodgeball world. Welcome to "Rookie vs. Legend".


New sensation Joanice Lima has shown mental prowess and physical resiliency in her brief, yet impressive rise to superstardom. Her specialty sideline throw is expected to be fully locked and powerfully loaded if she intends to defeat her opposing combatant.
  • Born May 8, 1985
  • Debut July 24, 2010 | FAMILY AFFAIR III

    With over five-plus years of experience, Lauren Stopa has nearly done it all. Intense battles with Lauren Winston and several career-threatening injuries have not forced this legend into early retirement. Her extensive knowledge of the game and its competitors give her the edge heading into MAYDAY.
  • Born June 15, 1987
  • Debut November 5, 2005 | DODGEBALL XTWO

    Brace yourself for the crash landing that is EastCoastDodgeball MAYDAY!
    It all goes "down" Saturday, May 21, beginning at 5pm, from the hallowed grounds of Wall High School.

    ____________________________________________________________________


    MAYDAY Exclusive!
    On June 18, ECD proudly presents the unprecedented 4th Annual FAMILY AFFAIR extravaganza. In preparation for the monumental event, "The Writer" will announce the titanic-sized main event for the June 18th spectacular. Keep your voices down and your ears open for the earth-shattering news!
